item.title: Accenture plc 10-K
item.description: Accenture plc, which is in the Services-Business Services, Nec [7389] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 12, 2022 had 31222 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 398 instances accenture - 346 instances financial - 261 instances share - 254 instances 10 - 245 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
